title: Adventures of a Christmas Elf
description: A festive adventure that will take you round the world in the third of the top-ten bestselling Christmas Elf Chronicles from Ben Miller. Pre-order now!Father Christmas needs a holiday. He isn't feeling well and someone seems determined to ruin the festivities. It's up to Christmas Elves, Tog and Holly, to find a way to deliver the presents on time and bring the Christmas magic back for everyone.Â A laugh-out-loud race against time with a heartwarming message of teamwork, and the perfect stocking filler for all the family to enjoy this Christmas.
author: Ben     Miller
